title: Android 13 DP2: ‘Do Not Disturb’ rebranded to ‘Priority mode’ [Update: Reverted]
content:
Google has decided to rename Android’s classic “Do Not Disturb” setting to “Priority mode” in the second preview of Android 13.

Update: Google now seems to be walking back this change.

more…

The post Android 13 DP2: ‘Do Not Disturb’ rebranded to ‘Priority mode’ [Update: Reverted] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has decided not to rename Android's classic "Do Not Disturb" setting to "Priority mode," as of the latest preview of Android 13.
